attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who think's that Ian Wright is an absolute legend and should be given a knitehood????
He has passion for football, is a fantastic role model and has already been awarded an MBE.
He is a great sportsman and is an all round nice guy.... Give the man what he truely deserves....
IAN WRIGHT WRIGHT WRIGHT!!!!
